calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Financial institutions - Too important to fail
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Lord Turner of Ecchinswell, Chairman, Financial Services Authority

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: (i) Work of the UK Border Agency (ii) Work of the British Transport Police
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: (i) Louise Perrett; John Vine, Chief Inspector, UK Border Agency (at 10.50am); Lin Homer, Chief Executive UK Border Agency (at 11.20am) (ii) Chief Constable Andy Trotter, British Transport Police (at 11.50am)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: i) Crown Dependencies (ii) Justice issues in Europe
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: (i) Lord Bach, Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State, Ministry of Justice (ii) Lord Bach, Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State, Ministry of Justice, and Emma Gibbons, Head of EU Section, Home Office (at 5.15pm)
